title: How to use Active Edge with different assistant?
content:
When using the Google assistant, you can enable "Squeeze for your Assistant" in the Active Edge settings. However, that setting vanishes once you select a different assistant.

Can somebody confirm that Active Edge exclusively works with Google Assistant only? Because I don't see any way to use Active Edge with a different assistant.

Device is Pixel 3 with Android 10 January 2020 patch.

Thanks
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
